page.title: 05Sports Facilities
page.content: {Public Facilities: }Llandough Recreation Ground, Cogan Recreation Ground, Plassey Street Recreation Ground, Albert Road Park and Bowling Green, Alexandra Park, Stanwell School Playing Fields and Tennis Courts. {Private Clubs: }Penarth Yacht Club, Rectory Road Bowling Club, Rectory Road Tennis Courts, Penarth Snooker Hall. The Penarth Public Baths on the Esplanade have this year been closed and a new Leisure Centre has been opened on Cogan Recreation Ground.Facilities offered are:- swimming, squash, badminton, sports hall, sauna and solarium. The most popular day is Sunday when 800 - 900 people come. The centre cost Â£1.3 million to build. About the same number of adults and children attend.
